settings.image_credit: Our model Sydnee at the Sunrise Shack
settings.title: What is Vacations
settings.content: Traveling and being in and out of water is at the core of our brand. A part of this is taking you along our journey as we travel the globe in our product. Our first stop O’ahu where we did our first campaign shoot. Below is a little why we love the island and culture so much.

settings.title: Our model Sydnee says
settings.content: “I love taking my hoodie to the beach, it’s perfect to throw on after a swim”

settings.image_credit: Fresh fruit at the Kakuku Land Farms
settings.title: Hawaiian Culture
settings.content:
When in Hawai’i remember to practice ‘Kuleana’: the responsibility, privilege and duty to learn and honor Hawai’ian culture. According to the Hawai’ian custom, kuleana is grantedto those who express a readiness and worthiness to undertake the responsibility of being among a native and most sacred land. 

On the picturesque North Shore of O’ahu, where the swaying palms and salty breeze watch surfers’ shred, you find roadside treasures at every turn. Case in point: the Kakuku Land Farms fruit stands. From tangy pineapple to creamy mangos, the humble roadside stalls boast a variety of fresh, harvested fruits sourced from local farms. Our
favorite snack to stop for is the fried bananas or banana lumpia. Crunchy and sweet with a caramelized crust, we catch ourselves daydreaming about this budget-friendly bite often.

settings.title: Chickens roam wild in O'ahu
settings.credit: O'ahu's wild chickens: colorful, free-roaming descendants of Polynesian settlers.

settings.title: Surf Culture
settings.content: The tradition of surfing or he’e nalu on the Hawaiian Islands can be traced back to the 4th century. Initially an activity reserved for the ruling class, ancient Hawaiians used long wooden boards called olo to ride waves. Considered one of the world’s most famous surf spots, the North Shore of O’ahu is known for its challenging waves that attract pro surfers from around the globe.

settings.title: Hygienic and Ultra-Durable
settings.content: We deeply understand the importance of freshness and durability when it comes to drying off.  Our recycled yarns have built-in SILVADUR™ antimicrobial and anti-odor technology for advanced protection against bacteria that causes smelly towel syndrome.
